DOC.brief_summary: 1. CBT-001 administered three times daily (TID) for 4 weeks has an acceptable safety profile when used in pterygium patients 2. CBT-001 administered TID for 4 weeks is more effective than the vehicle in reducing pterygium vascularity and inhibiting pterygium lesion growth 3. CBT-001 administered as topical ocular dosing displays negligible systemic drug exposure
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of CBT-001 Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Pterygium
